inclusion.criterion: survivors of COVID-19, health workers and women suffering from gender-based violence with level of post-traumatic stress disorder scale (DSM-V) moderate or severe
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: they could manage to stand in the position of 'lying', 'sitting', and 'standing' without assistance
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: they could not follow the intervention due to mental or physical health
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The sample size is determined according Argimon' formula of comparison of proportions.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Parkinson's disease, experiences slowness of movement and tremors. He lives with his wife and has three children.
